Room.Name: Netherworld Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Netherworld Lane, south of the Rodaisl Housing Center.
Room.LongDescription: The Rodaisl Community Housing Complex is one of two community housing complexes in Oceancrest. The Rodaisl Complex is much larger than the Obidian Complex, located off of Wakeforest Drive, and has room for nearly fifteen thousand people, or roughly four thousand apartments that can house up to four people each. On the south side of the road, you can see the Riverdell Tranquility Park, where people usually go to relax after a long day of work.
